name: Unlucky Seven (itch)
description:
ARE YOU READY to overcome dread, walk through the crowd of monsters and get out of the sinister valley?

REMEMBER:
Your goal - find two hidden keys, open the door and escape;
If you take damage, the dice will decide your fate: 7 - you lost, not 7 - you're in luck;
You fire the last seventh bullet - you take damage, and the dice will spin again;
Each time the timer expires, the large dice will stop, and if a 7 is rolled, you will receive a temporary negative effect.

CONTROL:
WASD - move;
Space or R - reload;
Left mouse button - shot.

Created for Mini Jam 83
Theme: Dread
Limitation: Dice must be a mechanic
